content.description: Direct up the aerte at the end of "A fear of Spiders" good jug with the left hand and a decent jug/ side pull with the right. Go straight up to finish.
content.location: Far left end of the Corridor in the same cave as "A fear of spiders"

content.description: Sit start with fingers in crack, an awkward foot. crank to the top, mantle over the top.

climbs.name: There's good, there's bad and there's just plain ugly

content.description: Start just right of the tree growing against the rock on the slopers just above head height. Go straight up. The top, like everything else needs some love and is currently pretty dirty.
content.location: On the same wall as "keep it tight" starting to the right of the tree that grows against the rock.

content.description: Very Dirty, big holds, and kinda tall. head straight up the left end of the wall
content.location: This is on the tall somewhat slabby wall with big holds to the right of Tweety Bird's Nest. Located just to the left of the really tall arete that is somewhat covered by the small pine tree.

content.description: Sit start on the far right with good hands on the horizontal crack and bad feet, move left to a really good hold, set your feet and make a big move up to the slopey jug finish straight up with a questionable and dirty top out.
content.location: On the first decent face on the right of the Corridor. This wall has a huge Anarchy symbol spray painted on it by some hooligans a couple years  back.

content.description: Start all the way left with a right hand on the low ledge and a right hand on the only obvious place to put it. Move right with low feet behind/under the tree to the good slopers and then finish straight up or go to the big lip on the right side next to the huge crack. Do not use the big flake down low as it will likely break off. The top is dirty, bring a brush
content.location: On the slightly overhanging wall left of the anarchy wall with a big crack on the right side and a tree growing against the rock near the left side. this starts all the way on the left side and moves under the tree and right on the holds just over head height.

content.description: Start on the same big hold as "In spite of Authority" and traverse left following the horizontal crack on good holds until you hit the junky crack-ish area behind the small pine tree. Topping out is dirty.

Starting on the right side for the cave with your feet all the way in the cave on a small shelf and your hands in the juggy crack, move right out of the cave following the crack until the arete the straight up to finish.
content.location: On the far end of the right side of the corridor there starting in the little cave maybe 50-60 feet from the trail, just before the trail forks.

content.description: This is an unmistakable area with short walls on the right and currently very dirty slabs on the left immediately off the trail. The rock is not great, and some areas may crumble. However, there are some very cool faces that could use a little more traffic. Bring a brush... you will need it.
